trans-unit.source: Converts instances of other types to and from a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PointCollection"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PointCollectionConverter"></xref> class.
Determines whether an object can be converted from a specified type to an instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PointCollection"></xref>.
The context information of a type.
The type of the source that is being evaluated for conversion.
`true` if the type can be converted to a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PointCollection"></xref>; otherwise, `false`.
Determines whether an instance of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PointCollection"></xref> can be converted to a different type.
The context information of a type.
The needed type for which you are evaluating this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PointCollection"></xref> for conversion.
`true` if this can be converted to destinationType; otherwise, `false`.
Attempts to convert the specified object to a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PointCollection"></xref>.
To determine whether you can perform a conversion without actually performing the conversion, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointCollectionConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> method.
The context information of a type.
The <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> of the type you want to convert.
The object being converted.
The that is created from converting value.
The specified object is null or is a type that cannot be converted to a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PointCollection"></xref>.
Attempts to convert a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PointCollection"></xref> to a specified type.
To determine whether you can perform a conversion without actually performing the conversion, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.PointCollectionConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> method.
The context information of a type.
The <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> of the type you want to convert.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PointCollection"></xref> to convert.
The type to convert this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PointCollection"></xref> to.
The object that is created from converting this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PointCollection"></xref>.
value is null or is not a ; or the destinationType is not one of the valid types for conversion.
